Hero Grid Option 1

test
test
test 
<div class="grid grid--opt-1">
	<!-- infinite 2x3 patterns -->
	<div class="u-bg-c--blue u-color--white u-padding--all">

		test

	</div>
	<div class="u-bg-c--gray">

	</div>
	<div class="u-bg-c--error u-color--white u-padding--all">
		test
	</div>
	<div class="u-bg-c--green u-color--white u-padding--all">
		test
	</div>


</div>

Hero Grid Option 2

test
x
<div class="grid grid--opt-2">
	<!-- infinite 2x3 patterns -->
	<div class="u-bg-c--blue u-padding--all u-color--white u-font--center">

		test

	</div>
	<div class="u-bg-c--gray u-padding--all"></div>
	<div class="u-bg-c--white u-padding--all">x</div>
	<div class="u-bg-c--green u-padding--all"></div>


</div>

Layout Grid Halves

<div class="grid grid--base grid--2">

	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--error"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--blue"></div>

</div>

Layout Grid Thirds

<div class="grid grid--base grid--3">
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--error"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--blue"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--gray"></div>
</div>

Layout Grid Fourths

<div class="grid grid--base grid--4">
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--error"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--blue"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--gray"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--blue"></div>
</div>

Layout Grid Two Thirds Left

<div class="grid grid--base grid--2-3">
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--error"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--blue"></div>
</div>

Layout Grid Two Thirds Reverse

<div class="grid grid--base grid--2-3--reverse">
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--error"></div>
	<div class="u-padding--all u-bg-c--blue"></div>

</div>

Margin

Margin Examples

Top Margin!
Bottom Margin!
All Margins here!
(Becareful of the double-margin bug!) 
<div class="u-margin--top">
	Top Margin!
</div>

<div class="u-margin--bottom">
	Bottom Margin!
</div>

<div class="u-margin--all">
	All Margins here!
	<br /><small><em>(Becareful of the double-margin bug!)</em></small>
</div>

Padding

Padding Examples

Top padded!
Bottom padded!
All padded here! 
<div class="u-padding--top">
	Top padded!
</div>

<div class="u-padding--bottom">
	Bottom padded!
</div>

<div class="u-padding--all">
	All padded here!
</div>

</span>

<br />

    <strong>Test</strong>
</span>
<br />

    <strong>Error!</strong>
</span>

Wrap

Wrap Examples

This is max-wide 64em / centered
This is max-wide 40em / centered 
<div class="u-wrap--em-64 u-margin--c u-margin--top">
	This is max-wide 64em / centered
</div>

<div class="u-wrap--em-40 u-margin--c u-margin--top">This is max-wide 40em / centered </div>
